content.question: Ergo . . . excitatae (line 1) is translated

choices.label: Therefore, because their courage was celebrated, the women too were summoned to public office
As a result, since courage was valued in this way, women also were moved to public deeds of bravery
Therefore, through virtue respected in this way, women too were infuriated by public displays
As a result, along with esteemed virtue, women also were raised up to public propriety in this way

content.answer: As a result, since courage was valued in this way, women also were moved to public deeds of bravery
